name: Collect All The Coins!
description:
Current Version: Beta V1

Goal of The Game
The goal of the game is to collect as much coins as you can before the time reaches 1300. 

How the Game Ends

When the player touches a moving block they die and the game ends. In addition, when the time reaches 1300, the game ends.

Movement

To move, use the right arrow key. The player is constantly being pushed to the left, so to move to the left, don't do anything.

Future Updates

V1.0 - The game will have color

V1.1 - The game will have background music.
